Laravel Forge Deployment Verification Summary

Overviewâ€‹

The Laravel Forge deployment documentation for accessibility.icjia.app has been thoroughly verified and enhanced with comprehensive details for a single-domain, multi-service setup.

Architecture Verified âœ…â€‹

Single Domain Setupâ€‹

  • Domain: accessibility.icjia.app
  • Frontend: React SPA served at / (port 5173 â†’ Nginx)
  • API: Express backend at /api/ (port 3001 â†’ Nginx)
  • Documentation: Docusaurus at /docs/ (port 3002 â†’ Nginx)

Service Architectureâ€‹

accessibility.icjia.app (Nginx on port 80/443)
â”œâ”€â”€ / â†’ Frontend (React SPA, dist directory)
â”œâ”€â”€ /api/ â†’ Backend (Express on 127.0.0.1:3001)
â””â”€â”€ /docs/ â†’ Documentation (Docusaurus on 127.0.0.1:3002)

Nginx Configuration Verified âœ…â€‹

Key Featuresâ€‹

  • âœ… HTTP to HTTPS redirect
  • âœ… SSL/TLS with Let's Encrypt (auto-managed by Forge)
  • âœ… Frontend SPA routing (try_files for React Router)
  • âœ… API proxy with proper headers (X-Real-IP, X-Forwarded-For, X-Forwarded-Proto)
  • âœ… Documentation proxy with proper headers
  • âœ… Security headers (X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options)
  • âœ… Proxy timeouts (60s for both API and docs)
  • âœ… Gzip compression enabled
  • âœ… Static asset caching (1 year for versioned files)
  • âœ… Sensitive file protection (.env, .git, .htaccess)
  • âœ… Logging configured for debugging

Proxy Configurationâ€‹

  • Uses 127.0.0.1 (not localhost) for upstream proxying
  • Avoids DNS resolution overhead
  • More reliable in production environments
  • Properly forwards all necessary headers for CORS and client IP tracking

Backend Configuration Verified âœ…â€‹

Express Serverâ€‹

  • âœ… Listens on port 3001
  • âœ… CORS configured with FRONTEND_URL environment variable
  • âœ… Supports WebSocket upgrades (for real-time features)
  • âœ… Health check endpoint at /api/health
  • âœ… Database connectivity verification in health check
  • âœ… Rate limiting enabled
  • âœ… Cookie parser enabled
  • âœ… JSON body parsing enabled

Environment Variablesâ€‹

  • âœ… VITE_SUPABASE_URL - Supabase project URL
  • âœ… VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY - Supabase anonymous key
  • âœ… VITE_API_URL - Frontend API endpoint (https://accessibility.icjia.app/api)
  • âœ… FRONTEND_URL - Backend CORS origin (https://accessibility.icjia.app)
  • âœ… NODE_ENV - Set to production
  • âœ… PORT - Set to 3001

Frontend Configuration Verified âœ…â€‹

Vite Buildâ€‹

  • âœ… Builds to dist/ directory
  • âœ… Includes all static assets
  • âœ… Optimized for production
  • âœ… SPA routing configured

Environment Variablesâ€‹

  • âœ… VITE_SUPABASE_URL - Used by frontend for Supabase client
  • âœ… VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY - Used by frontend for Supabase auth
  • âœ… VITE_API_URL - Used for API requests (https://accessibility.icjia.app/api)

Documentation Configuration Verified âœ…â€‹

Docusaurus Setupâ€‹

  • âœ… Runs on port 3002
  • âœ… Configured for production build
  • âœ… Includes ICJIA logo
  • âœ… Emoji support in sidebar
  • âœ… Dark theme with green accents
  • âœ… Responsive design

PM2 Configuration Verified âœ…â€‹

Backend Serviceâ€‹

  • âœ… Uses tsx interpreter for TypeScript execution
  • âœ… Runs server/index.ts directly (no build step needed)
  • âœ… Configured for fork mode (single instance)
  • âœ… Auto-restart enabled
  • âœ… Max memory restart: 500MB
  • âœ… Logging configured with timestamps
  • âœ… Max restarts: 10
  • âœ… Min uptime: 10s

Documentation Serviceâ€‹

  • âœ… Uses Yarn workspace command
  • âœ… Runs yarn workspace icjia-accessibility-docs start
  • âœ… Configured for fork mode
  • âœ… Auto-restart enabled
  • âœ… Logging configured with timestamps
  • âœ… Max restarts: 10
  • âœ… Min uptime: 10s

PM2 Startupâ€‹

  • âœ… pm2 save persists process list
  • âœ… pm2 startup enables auto-start on server reboot
  • âœ… Processes automatically restart if they crash

Deployment Script Verified âœ…â€‹

Build Processâ€‹

  • âœ… Pulls latest code from main branch
  • âœ… Installs production dependencies only
  • âœ… Builds frontend and documentation
  • âœ… Verifies build success (checks for dist directory)
  • âœ… Restarts backend services with PM2
  • âœ… Saves PM2 process list
  • âœ… Displays deployment completion URLs

Error Handlingâ€‹

  • âœ… set -e stops on first error
  • âœ… Build verification prevents deployment of failed builds
  • âœ… Logging at each step for debugging
